rows.label: qev090701_MSG0001
rows.name: Um, hello? Yes, could you not...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090701_MSG0002
rows.name:
You there, the one about to take that mission?
I'm speaking to you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090701_JNK0010
rows.name: Answer

rows.label: qev090701_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask the man what he wants.

rows.label: qev090701_JNK0020
rows.name: Ignore

rows.label: qev090701_SEL0021
rows.name: Take the mission without paying the man any notice.

rows.label: qev090701_MSG0003
rows.name:
Oh, good. You're a sensible sort.
I promise this will only take a moment of your time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090701_MSG0004
rows.name: You know, non-diplomatic people like you are a real problem.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090701_MSG0005
rows.name: You're why we still have war.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090701_MSG0006
rows.name:
Or maybe you're just hearing-impaired?
I don't know. Whatever. I'm continuing.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090701_MSG0007
rows.name:
Now, where was I? Ah, yes.
The mission you were about to take.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090701_MSG0008
rows.name:
I analyzed it based on criteria ranging from Pathfinder
experience, build, intelligence...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090701_MSG0009
rows.name:
Yes, well. In aggregate, the data clearly indicates
that the more qualified candidate is me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090701_MSG0010
rows.name: Hector Birtwhistle.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090701_MSG0011
rows.name:
I invite you to set pride aside and allow me to handle this.
For humanity's sake.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090701_JNK0030
rows.name: Decline

rows.label: qev090701_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell H.B. to save his breath.

rows.label: qev090701_JNK0040
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: qev090701_SEL0041
rows.name: Ask how such a thing could possibly benefit humanity.

rows.label: qev090701_MSG0012
rows.name:
Stubborn and insulting. No surprise.
Look, just take this mission instead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090701_MSG0013
rows.name: It's quite simple, really—because I'm more skilled than you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090701_MSG0014
rows.name:
I can offer a total guarantee of success,
whereas you...well...cannot.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090701_MSG0015
rows.name: Here. This other mission should be right up your alley.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090701_MSG0016
rows.name:
I believe that picking two samples of zesian fleawort
should be well within your abilities.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090701_MSG0017
rows.name: Is something amiss? You seem dissatisfied.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090701_MSG0018
rows.name: Ah, how tragic. You now insist on comparing yourself to me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090701_MSG0019
rows.name: The solution is clear.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090701_MSG0020
rows.name: We'll both complete the three missions I just accepted.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090701_MSG0021
rows.name: Only one of us can finish first.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090701_MSG0022
rows.name:
This will provide the loser—by which I mean you—
ample chance to understand the gap separating us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090701_MSG0023
rows.name:
Whenever you eventually complete those missions,
come find me here. I'll be waiting.[ST:wait ]
